thread.title: Why Wall Street is able to stay one step ahead of federal investigations - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Why Wall Street is able to stay one step ahead of federal investigations - Business Insider

author: Joe Avella
title: Why Wall Street is able to stay one step ahead of federal investigations - Business Insider
text:
In her new book "Black Edge: Inside Information, Dirty Money, and the Quest to Bring Down the Most Wanted Man on Wall Street," author Sheelah Kolhatkar chronicles the incredible story of the biggest insider trading scandal in history. Kolhatkar explains how the FBI's resources are vastly inferior to those of a top hedge fund. 
Follow BI Video: On Twitter Most Popular
